Text:
Audio goes out of sync after Act I - gets progressively worse from then. Also, needs subs to fully appreciate the opera.

Any solutions would be great as it's without a doubt the best production of La Boheme ever done!

The audio quality is crap too.  Not just in the "FLAC vs. MP3 V0" way, but the high notes have a lot of interference and Freni's singing gets so static-y its hard to listen to.  

This is a great recording though, and certainly the best-sung on video.

New rip!
